parameters.name: Locked
parameters.description:
The lock status of the transcoding template group. Valid values:

*   **Enabled**: The transcoding template group is locked and cannot be modified.
*   **Disabled** (default): The transcoding template group is not locked.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the transcoding template group.

*   The name cannot exceed 128 bytes.
*   The value must be encoded in UTF-8.

parameters.name: TranscodeTemplateGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the transcoding template group.

parameters.name: TranscodeTemplateList
parameters.description: The configurations of the transcoding template. The value must be a JSON string. For more information about the data structure, see [TranscodeTemplate](~~52839#title-9mb-8o2-uu6~~).
